attributes.action: Its time for Gordon Brown to go!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The price of petrol is getting too high, junior doctors are losing out on free accomodation, and the government is generally a wreck that is failing the people of Britain. Gordon Brown should have control of these issues, but clearly he hasn't, or else he is trying to fleece the people of Britain. We Want an election and we want rid of Gordon!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
